com.k2.Util.Identity

Class IdentityUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.k2.Util.Identity.IdentityUtil

  • public class IdentityUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    The identity utility provides static methods for handling id values for objects. To reduce the overhead of reflection a static map is held of the id fields for each class. This map is populated for automatically when the identify value is got or set for an object.
    Author:
    simon

    • Method Detail

      • getIdentity

        public static java.lang.String getIdentity(java.lang.Object obj,
                                           java.lang.String defaultVal)
        This method gets the serializable id value from an object. If no identity field is identifiable in the class or its super classes then the given default value is returned
        Parameters:
        obj - The object for which to extract the id value
        defaultVal - The default value to return if a suitable id value cannot be found
        Returns:
        The id value for the object. If no id field can be identified then the objects simple class name is returned

      • getId

        public static java.io.Serializable getId(java.lang.Object obj,
                                         java.io.Serializable defaultVal)
        This method gets the serializable id value from an object. If no id field is identifiable in the class or its super classes then the name of the class is returned
        Parameters:
        obj - The object for which to extract the id value
        defaultVal - The default value to return if a suitable id value cannot be found
        Returns:
        The id value for the object. If no id field can be identified then the objects simple class name is returned

      • getId

        public static java.io.Serializable getId(java.lang.Object obj)
        This method gets the serializable id value from an object. If no id field is identifiable in the class or its super classes then the name of the class is returned
        Parameters:
        obj - The object for which to extract the id value
        Returns:
        The id value for the object. If no id field can be identified then the objects simple class name is returned

      • toKey

        public static java.io.Serializable toKey(java.lang.Class<? extends java.io.Serializable> keyCls,
                                         java.lang.String keyStr)
        This static method converts the given string representation of a key into an instance of the given key class and
        Parameters:
        keyCls - The class of the key that is to be generatated from the string representation of the key
        keyStr - The string representation of the key
        Returns:
        An instance of the key class generated from the string representation of the key

      • getIdFieldType

        public static java.lang.Class<? extends java.io.Serializable> getIdFieldType(java.lang.Class<?> cls)
        This method returns the Serializable class of the Id field of the given class
        Parameters:
        cls - The class for which the class of the Id field is required
        Returns:
        The class that is used to represent the Id of the given class
